name: RouteAlarm
0:
”Alexa open route alarm.”
”Alexa launch route alarm.”
”Alexa start route alarm.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: route alarm
des:
Route Alarm is built to get you where you need to go on time. Route alarm is conversational, just say, "Alexa, start route alarm." From there, route alarm will ask you a few simple questions. Route alarm automagically references Google Maps data to get accurate travel times. It tells you exactly what time to set your alarm to so you will not be late!

DISCLAIMER:
This app is only for educational purposes, do not rely heavily on the results returned. Addresses must be given in the Number + Street format. Time to get ready must be given in minutes.
